name: ShapeShifter (PseudoBytes)
description:
A wall with empty spaces cut into it is slowly moving toward you. Move and rotate the shapes to fit through the hole before it arrives in these randomly generated levels.

I initially created this game for the Untitled Game Jam, but because you only need your left mouse button to play this game I will also submit this game to the One Button Jam. I know you can also use R and W, but these are completely optional.

Untitled Game Jam 11 and One Button Jam 2019 Submission
Untitled Game Jam Theme: 'Space'
